title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the types of data to be generated (structured, unstructured, time-series, etc.), privacy constraints (data anonymization, differential privacy, etc.), target domains (healthcare, finance, IoT, etc.), desired output formats (CSV, JSON, SQL, etc.), and any specific regulatory or compliance requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data generation, privacy preservation, and output formatting.

title: Implement Data Generation Module
description: Develop the core module responsible for generating synthetic data across various domains.

title: Implement Privacy Preservation Module
description: Develop the module responsible for ensuring the generated data preserves privacy and complies with relevant regulations.

title: Develop Output Formatting Module
description: Implement the module responsible for formatting the generated data into the desired output formats.

title: Create User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the synthetic data generation platform.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the platform.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, API references, and developer documentation.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute a thorough testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the platform's quality and reliability.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the platform to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging systems to ensure its ongoing performance and stability.
